response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value to us at $1,000,000. Considering its significance and the benefits it offers to you, I am extending this offer to you at a special price of $950,000. This is a unique chance to secure a remarkable asset at a competitive rate.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am confident that this product will meet and exceed your expectations, providing substantial returns and value for your investment.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
